artist: Author: Wendy-O Matik; Publisher: Manic D Press, San Francisco
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Perfect bound volume, full bleed photo-collage featuring nude figure with letterpress text printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers; 88 pp.
inscription: Title page, green ink pen: for Fly, / WOMEN of Words / United (heart) / With LOVE, / WENDY-O / \'98
medium: Letterpress, color offset lithography; bound volume
title: Love like Rage
